Update Manager API: DistSpecific.Ubuntu module¶

Ubuntu-specific functionality.

Implementation¶

class UpdateManager.DistSpecific.Ubuntu.UbuntuDist¶

Implementation of distribution-specific functionality for Ubuntu.

classmethod fetch_dist_info()¶
Doesn’t do anything for now
get_update_category(pkg_info)¶
Returns the update category
